info.institution: Engineering School (Escola Politénica) at University of Sao Paulo
info.summary:
Fabio Gagliardi Cozman works as a Professor in Engineering School (Escola Politénica) at University of Sao Paulo, and his\her h-index is 34, g-index is 64. His\Her interests are :
 Bayesian Network; Imprecise Probabilit...; Credal Network; Probability Measure; Mobile Robot;
